revision.text:
{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Sprayduck |image = [[File:Sprayduck_New.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Sprayduck''. |dex = 60 |effect = Makes your [[Berries]] grow faster }} The '''Sprayduck''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it increases the speed at which [[Berries]] grow (and wither) in the [[Farm]]. The Sprayduck is unlocked after catching 60 unique Pok√©mon. == Details == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Level !! Effect !! Upgrade Requirement !! Upgrade Cost |- |0 || x1.25 Growth Speed || 500 Berry harvest Experience || style="text-align:right" | 50,000 {{pdollar}} |- |1 || x1.3 Growth Speed || 500 Berry harvest Experience || style="text-align:right" | 100,000 {{pdollar}} |- |2 || x1.35 Growth Speed || 1500 Berry harvest Experience || style="text-align:right" | 250,000 {{pdollar}} |- |3 || x1.4 Growth Speed || 2500 Berry harvest Experience || style="text-align:right" | 500,000 {{pdollar}} |- |4 || x1.45 Growth Speed || 5000 Berry harvest Experience || style="text-align:right" | 1,000,000 {{pdollar}} |- |5/Max || x1.5 Growth Speed || N/A || style="text-align:right" | N/A |- |} == Berries harvest Experience == All values are calculated using a level 0 Sprayduck equipped. While the XP per minute will increase with a higher level Sprayduck, it will not change the relative speeds. The best berry remains the best no matter what level your sprayduck is at. The XP per minute are rounded to 2 decimal places. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Dex # !! Berry !! XP per Harvest !! XP per Minute |- | #1 [[File:Cheri.png|25px]] || [[Cheri]] || style="text-align:right" | 1 || style="text-align:right" | {{ #expr: 60/(30/1.25)*1round2 }} |- | #2 [[File:Chesto.png|25px]] || [[Chesto]] || style="text-align:right" | 2 || style="text-align:right" | {{ #expr: 60/(40/1.25)*2round2 }} |- | #3 [[File:Pecha.png|25px]] || [[Pecha]] || style="text-align:right" | 3 || style="text-align:right" | {{ #expr: 60/((1*60)/1.25)*3round2 }} |- | #4 [[File:Rawst.png|25px]] || [[Rawst]] || style="text-align:right" | 4 || style="text-align:right" | {{ #expr: 60/((1*60+20)/1.25)*4round2 }} |- | #5 [[File:Aspear.png|25px]] || [[Aspear]] || style="text-align:right" | 5 || style="text-align:right" | {{ #expr: 60/((2*60)/1.25)*5round2 }} |- | #6 60/((24*60^2)/1.25)*20round2 }} |- | #66 [[File:Starf.png|25px]] || [[Starf]] || style="text-align:right" | 20 || style="text-align:right" | {{ #expr: 60/((24*60^2)/1.25)*20round2 }} |- | #67 [[File:Enigma.png|25px]] || [[Enigma]] || style="text-align:right" | 20 || style="text-align:right" | {{ #expr: 60/((24*60^2)/1.25)*20round2 }} |- |} Note: The numbers for Wacan are varried since Wacans increases the growth rate of nearby berries. The XP per minute rate will be {{ #expr: 60/((30*60)/1.25)*1round2 }} for a single Wacan. However, if you plant a Wacan next to 8 ripe Wacans, that middle Wacan will have an XP per minute of {{ #expr: 60/((30*60)/(1.3^8*1.25))*1round2 }}. Each Wacan will have an XP per minute somewhere between these two values (with a level 0 Sprayduck equipped, and no boost mulch applied).
